snippet: Initial reports suggested that the fatal shooting occurred after a dispute broke out between coalition and Afghan soldiers in the Marja district of Helmand Province.
abstract: Man wearing Afghan Army uniform opens fire on coalition soldiers in southern Afghanistan, killing one service member; NATO is investigating the attack.
lead_paragraph: Initial reports suggested that the fatal shooting occurred after a dispute broke out between coalition and Afghan soldiers in the Marja district of Helmand Province.

headline.seo: Attacker in Afghan Army Uniform Kills NATO Soldier
headline.main: Attacker in an Afghan Uniform Kills a NATO Soldier
headline.print_headline: Attacker in Garb Of Afghan Army Kills a Soldier
